name: Stakify Finance
description: The first repellent backed rebase protocol, offering an exceptionally high APY of 100,000% to early adopters. Purchase $SIFY tokens and retain them in your wallet to automatically accumulate rebase rewards. The tokens grow in quantity every 15 minutes. Positive Rebase Formula Stakify employs a Positive Rebase formula that enables the direct correlation between daily token distribution and rebase rewards. Distribution occurs daily during each epoch (rebase period) for all $SIFY holders. This strategy ensures that holders receive an annual compound interest rate without the need to move their tokens. No Traditional Staking Required Our approach obviates the requirement for conventional approval and staking of tokens. There's no need for the traditional process to earn rewards. SIFY Repellent Feature The positive rebase mechanism is supported by the SIFY Repellent Feature, which is both guaranteed and bolstered by our contract. This feature enhances the stability and sustainability of the positive rebase structure.
